attributes.action: Protect the nations green belt by discounting the notion that we need more housing because there is a so called baby boom. The increase in population is cause almost entirely by the governments uncontrolled immigration policy that allows people from countires that we have no alligence or duty (unlike the Gurkha who have every right to stay here) as we are supposed to be apart of the eu then why oh why don't we adopt their immigration policies, there are not hoards of people storming the gates of France and Germany. Attempting to distroy our Green Belt is proof certain that we are over populated. Listen to the people, just for once
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
